title: Robin Smith: A Cricket Star's Life
summary: Robin Smith was a famous cricket player from England who played for his country and a team called Hampshire. He was born in South Africa in 1963 and moved to England as a teenager. He played many games for England, scoring lots of runs and making nine centuries. He was known for being brave and popular with fans. After he stopped playing cricket, he moved to Australia and had some tough times with his health. Sadly, he died at his home in Perth at age 62. His family said he was a great player and will be missed by many people who loved watching him play.
